Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: jamiers
Reviews.Content: Love all the features of this!! :) the wireless image transfer is great!!! Takes great pics above and below water. Takes good videos underwater also. Perfect camera!!!

Reviews.Title: Very Good, so far!!
Reviews.Author: Jeremy T. Driscoll
Reviews.Content: Good quality photos, good video in well lit areas. Quality gets grainy if the lighting is poor but it has a built in light, I haven't had a chance to use the underwater feature. My only complaint is that it doesn't come with the HDMI cable to connect to the TV and and you an HDMI mini adapter.

Reviews.Title: I love this little camera!
Reviews.Author: cmn310 "Chicago Chris"
Reviews.Content: I was debating between buying a waterproof camera or a big bulky device for my Nikon D90 and I'm so glad I chose this. We have done so much with it on our vacation in just 2 days that it's already justified the purchase. No issues with leaking and I've taken it all over Discovery Cove and done underwater pics and movies. No regrets here! Off to the water park tomorrow and I don't have to worry about the camera at all!

Reviews.Title: Excellent rugged waterproof camera
Reviews.Author: Ernesto
Reviews.Content: Perfect camera for taking on a vacation!  Inexpensive yet high quality unit that takes great pictures, even takes wonderful pictures underwater. If you have a Wifi capable tablet, download the Fujifilm app to transfer photos to your mobile device, I'd also recommend getting an additional battery to avoid any downtime waiting on the battery to charge.

Reviews.Title: Not at all waterproof!
Reviews.Author: AndiT
Reviews.Content: I originally bought this camera for an Aruba vacation.  Couldn't wait to use it snorkeling!  On the third day of our vacation, before our snorkel excursion, while in the water with my family, I had a "Memory Card Error". The camera wouldn't take a picture, even though this was a brand new memory card.  I got out of the water, dried the camera off completely and opened the door to the memory card and found my memory card to be wet.  Needless to say, the memory card was ruined and I had no others with me. For the rest of my Caribbean vacation, I had no pictures. I called Fuji and was told to return the camera and memory card and both would be replaced.  After waiting 5 weeks, I received the same exact camera back and was told that it was tested and found to be "fine". I then put the camera into a bowl of water for 20 minutes and once again, found water inside the door of where the memory card goes.  I then called again and was told I probably had water on my hands that got into the camera when I opened it.  I was told to send it back once again to have it tested.  But if it was found to be "fine" again, it would be sent back to me.  I then returned the camera to the store where it was purchased and got my money back.  DO NOT buy this camera!!! This was a horrible experience and I would NEVER buy a Fuji again.  The Service/Repair department and rude and tell you whatever it is they think you want to hear.  If you do buy this camera, don't assume it is waterproof, because it just might not be!!

Reviews.Title: Pictures not as sharp
Reviews.Author: Gregory J Honeycutt
Reviews.Content: I have noticed that quite a few of my photos aren't quite as sharp as I would like them to be.  Also still trying to play around with the settings so I can get items in shadows to show up more.  Overall, still like the camera.  Haven't tried it in water yet.  Mainly got it for the ruggedness.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: LAVON MIDDLETON
Reviews.Content: I love this little camera. I took it with me on my travels to Asia. It was perfect. Small enough to fit in my pocket and not weight me down. I took panoramic pics, pic at the beach in the water. Yes it is water proof, I even dropped it a few times by accident of course and it still works like a champ. This was money well spent.

Reviews.Title: Took decent pics but was not waterproof
Reviews.Author: Ryan
Reviews.Content: I got a week out of this camera. I did get some good photos from it after spending the whole week in the Ocean. It's rubber seals failed. It has a pretty decent 2 stage locking system and I used it as it is intended. When I got home I opened it up to get the card out and everything was wet in it. Ruined the battery, but the card worked enough to recovery my pics. Ordered a new battery to see if the camera can be salvaged.

Reviews.Title: Freaking love it. this thing is awesome!
Reviews.Author: Sober Soilder
Reviews.Content: Ok, I am no camera expert but had been taking my time and doing the research when Amazon had killer deal on this one. Does everything and works great. No gps features. Can send photos to smartphone but not directly to web. Clous storage would be the best but the  they wouldnt sell any memory would they....

Reviews.Title: Fujifilm XP170 Compact Digital Camera with 5xOptical Zoom Lens - Orange
Reviews.Author: Lois
Reviews.Content: I cannot rate this product and be fare, because I did not open or use the camera. My husband does have this camera in Blue and he likes it very much.

Reviews.Title: Leaked and not working after use in only 12 inches of water
Reviews.Author: B'more doc.
Reviews.Content: I bought the blue model as a second camera because of its "Waterproof" claim, just to take photos in and around the water as we love to take beach vacations. On our 1st beach vacation it worked fine after getting splashed by sea water, except that the latches became stiff to open and close. This was in spite of rinsing it off with fresh water and allowing it to fully dry before opening it. However on our second beach vacation, after still working fine in the surf getting splashed for the 1st 3 days, I decided to get some underwater photos of my sons snorkeling while I was standing holding the camera about 12 inches under the water. I double checked the latches prior to this. It took about 15 seconds of video then stopped working. After allowing it to dry completely it came back on. However it vibrates on its own, the flash goes off on its own, and everything looks blue. Fortunately nothing on the flash card was lost, but I had downloaded the photos and videos daily as a precaution anyway. Do not buy this camera. I will start searching for another. I wasted my money as it is too late to return it.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Ahmad
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing AF. Very fast for a point and shoot  Its a good thing the camera can handle higher ISO's well because the slower lens does eat up and demand a lot of light.

Reviews.Title: the perfec camara for the beach.
Reviews.Author: Wilfredo
Reviews.Content: amazing under the water,clear photos in the dark, here in the Caribbean work perfectly. and work perfectly in the beach.

Reviews.Title: Leaked and broke 2nd use
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera and was impressed with the size of the camera, photo options, and the zoom.The charger is not that great, due to the fact that the prongs do not fold down, so this can take up room in your travel bag, they can be removed from the charger, but you still have this awkward "T" prong that can't be neatly tucked away.CONS:Camera leaked on the 2nd use (day of trip).  What a POS!! took video and pictures in water, beach etc (picture quality is ok - bit washed out).On the 2nd day - the camera was in my bathing suit pocket in the pool.  pulled it out to take a video and some picture - got a few shots off then "Memory Card Error" came across screen. turned it off and on - still got the error message.  Then it would not shut off at all.  had to take out battery and memory card.  I notice that they were a little wet, and then I saw condensation on the lenses and lcd screen.. GAME OVER.even though there are 2 locks on this camera, and one can not be closed without the other being latched - it still leaked.I just returned my camera, or will have to use Credit Card protection.  I don't want Fuji to repair this - if it breaks after 2 days of use... I have no faith the company will give me a camera that last.  not fun to have your camera die during your trip.

Reviews.Title: All Terrain
Reviews.Author: maso
Reviews.Content: Very reliable for all risk activities with and without water. Under the sea, rain or strong sun behaves very well. Very good pictures and excellent underwater video. Good battery life

Reviews.Title: I'll know better when I get back
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Going snorkelling and want something that I can shoot ten feet under, I don't plan on going down 33 feet.  At least I have room to play with.

Reviews.Title: First camera didnt worked,second camera was worst!
Reviews.Author: Carolina Garcia "Momy of two"
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera. Had a leaking problem while vacationing in Mexico, so no pics for my kids! then second camera that was sent from Fujufilm didnt worked either, shoots were burned off. Do not recommend it!BE AWARE that FUJIFILM wont replace your NON WORKING camera with a new ONE, they will replace your camera with a REFURBISHED!! I coulnt believe it !!! They are making money of their useless cameras!! BE AWARE!

Reviews.Title: Frustrating Piece of Equipment - Maybe bad batch!!
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: Fujifilm XP170 Compact Digital Camera with 5xOptical Zoom Lens - OrangeVery Frustrating Experience with this camera!  I want a full refund or a replacement camera!The camera worked great.  I was very happy about it.  But I was well aware of other reviews and instances where the camera failed users when it was submerged under water.  In my situation, my boyfriend submerged the camera to take underwater photos, about 2 feet, but no more!  This was for no more than 20 minutes.  The camera light was green, and he tried to turn on the camera and take a picture, instead, the camera flickered with quick static (like old TV static) and the camera would not turn on.  He couldn't tell if it turned on and off, or if it just wouldn't turn on.  Back on the boat, he noticed the camera light was then red.  From then on, he was unable to turn it on!This is so frustrating given all the hassle I went through for it! (see below) When he got home, I opened the battery/SD chamber and water trickled out of it.  I removed the battery and SD card, and they were moist.  Even after patting the inside of the chamber water  still dripped out when I shook the camera.  I don't have a hair dryer, not to say that would be a safe way of drying the camera, so I will wait until tomorrow for the sun to come out to completely dry it before I put the battery and SD card back in again.Issues with entire camera experience:Aside from the functionality of the camera, I ordered this camera for a two-day delivery so I can receive it before I left the country.  (I moved overseas to a country where it's not so easy to ship things.)  Based on the guaranteed shipping time, I would have received it on time.  To my luck, UPS had a shipping delay due to bad weather and the camera never came.  I purchased the camera online because it saved me $35.  I could have purchased a similar but lower model at Costco for $179.  Instead, I had to pay an additional $70 to have the camera shipped to Central America.

ProductInfo.Features:
14MP CMOS
High Quality Fujinon 5x Optical Zoom Lens
4-Proof Protection: Waterproof 33', Shockproof 6.5', Freezeproof 14*, Dustproof
Full HD Movies
Innovative Wireless Image Transfer function
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm XP170 Compact Digital Camera with 5xOptical Zoom Lens - Orange
